[FAIL] vertical-lr-input block size should match width and inline size should match height
  assert_greater_than: expected a number greater than 13 but got 13
[FAIL] vertical-rl-input block size should match width and inline size should match height
  assert_greater_than: expected a number greater than 13 but got 13
